snippet.title: Copycat - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
🐾 Give your Steam wishlist some purrs: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1622350/Copycat

🎮 Copycat is a wholesome, narrative-driven game about rejection, belonging and the true meaning of home. It follows the story of a newly adopted shelter cat who becomes the victim of an elaborate plan when a jealous, stray copycat steals her place in the household. 

#devlog #indiegame #madewithunity

🌻 Hey! We're Sam and Kostia, a Kiwi and a Ukrainian, first-time game makers full-time dreamers. Our indie game project, Copycat, made us feel a little scaredy-cat entering the industry. So we started this devlog to share our progress and experiences in 2021. In 2022, we founded our video game collective called ‘Spoonful of Wonder’. Now in 2023, we have taken our demo to PAX and SXSW. We looking forward to launching early 2024. 

💛 Socials

Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1622350/Copycat

Online - https://spoonfulofwonder.com

Devlog - https://youtube.com/@CopycatGameDevlog

Twitter - https://twitter.com/gamecopycat

Instagram - https://instagram.com/copycat.game

Tiktok - https://tiktok.com/@copycat.indie.game


✉️ Mailing List

Press Mailing List (& Review Keys) - https://forms.gle/hGgP4omHi2eVEiB4A 

Player Mailing List - https://forms.gle/ayebRamC73sJKYGx9

Demo Testers Mailing List - https://forms.gle/W3dCi9JgkJWdoN3V9
